name: OR_LNLG_ANINF_CPT
description: This table contains the Anesthesia Info CPT codes for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ANES_INFO_CPTM_ID
columns.description: The Current Procedural Terminology (CPT) code documented by anesthesia.
